argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_0elon | |- (/) e. On |
| 2 |  | #P_oav | |- ( ( A e. On /\ (/) e. On ) -> ( A +o (/) ) = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> suc x ) , A ) ` (/) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A e. On -> ( A +o (/) ) = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> suc x ) , A ) ` (/) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 5 | 4 | #P_sucex | |- suc x e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. _V |-> suc x ) = ( x e. _V |-> suc x ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_fnmpti | |- ( x e. _V |-> suc x ) Fn _V |
| 8 |  | #P_rdgi0g | |- ( ( ( x e. _V |-> suc x ) Fn _V /\ A e. On ) -> ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> suc x ) , A ) ` (/) ) = A ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. On -> ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> suc x ) , A ) ` (/) ) = A ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. On -> ( A +o (/) ) = A ) |
